data.title: Nathalie Nasser_Curriculum Vitae
data.meta_description: Nathalie Nasser_Curriculum Vitae - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Nathalie Nasser, MBA nathalie_nasser@hotmail.com Mobile: (968)-97770959 (971)-563330515 AREAS OF EXPERTISE  Portfolio Management  Investment Analysis  Financial Analysis  Financial Statements  Feasibility Studies  Valuations & Forecasting  Public & Private Equities  Fixed Income & Sukuks  Funds & Real Estate  Financial Models  Risk Management  Market Research  Structuring  Sukuks  Islamic Finance  Islamic Banking EXPERIENCE Bank Nizwa, First Islamic Bank in Oman December 2013 - Present Manager – Investments & Structuring 1. Discuss with potential clients, assess needs and abilities and subsequently pitch holistic corporate finance and investment banking solutions; 2. Develop and review detailed financial models, cash flow projections, IRR, DSCR, FSCR, NPV, ROE, ROI and report on sensitivity and scenario-based analysis using advance tools of the MS Excel platform; 3. Assess financially and strategically investment deals and funds in the local market, GCC and internationally; 4. Draft analytical proposals for internal committees and the Board, and concurrently satisfy recommendations of Risk, Finance, Legal and Compliance Departments; 5. Present analytical proposals to the committees discuss extensively to persuade the investment decision; 6. Asses and structure corporate finance solutions for project finance deals, such as mezzanine financing, concession-based financing and asset-based securitization and for corporate clients based on Shari'a compliant products, such as Mushakara Mutanaqisa, Ijarah Mausufa Fil Zimma, Wekala Bil Istithmar, and Murabaha; 7. Originate, structure and execute phases of Islamic financing and fund raising mandates with an emphasis on developing financial valuation models, conducting due diligence and deal execution; 8. Draft investment offering documents, such as information memorandums and offering circulars, and liaise with relevant solicitors for compliance in relation to distribution of such documents in various jurisdictions; 9. Coordinate with various internal and external parties for the execution and completion of all transactions taken care of with all documentation in place; 10. Monitor closed deals and liaise with the trustees, facility and paying agents on an on-going basis, while preparing monthly, quarterly and semi-annual review reports for the Management and the Board; 11. Perform thorough market research to keep abreast of market trends and sector outlook on a deal-by-deal basis, and draft the market research reports pertaining to active transactions using internet based sources, as well as subscribed vendors such as Bloomberg and Reuters; and 12. Portfolio of investments ranges between mixed-use real estate, hospitality, healthcare, education and oil sectors. ALARGAN Towell Investment Company August 2012 – November 2013 Senior Investment Analyst Responsibilities & Duties: 1. Conducted primary and preliminary market research on real estate projects and potential deals in Oman, 2. Monitored the movement in the real estate market industry in Oman, 3. Performed feasibility studies for business and investment opportunities in Oman, 4. Analyzed all financial and economical aspects of comparable real estate investment and developing companies in the region, 5. Prepared presentations to be submitted to potential investors for new business development,

2. 6. Analyzed financial data of the economies in Oman in addition to trend analysis and forecasting, 7. Prepared valuations and business models for current projects in Oman, 8. Prepared progress reports for the various company projects in Oman. Ernst & Young, Muscat-Oman August 2010 – June 2012 Financial Analyst 2 Responsibilities & Duties: 1. Involved in a number of advisory service engagements (business modeling, financial analysis and report writing).  Performed the market study analysis for the feasibility study of redeveloping a 5-star resort hotel in Salalah - Oman; which included:  Prepared full financial analysis (Company, Peer & Market) for major companies in Oman from different sectors (Oil & Gas, Electric, Real Estate, Furnishing & Hotels); in addition to completing in-depth market, competitor and strategy research. 2. Prepared control files for every engagement assigned to as per the global quality and risk management standards of E&Y. 3. Prepared word document proposals in addition to power point presentation proposals. 4. Conducted some admin work as following up with clients and preparing necessary documents for the projects. Ernst & Young, Doha-Qatar September 2008 – June 2010 Financial Analyst 1 Responsibilities & Duties: 1. Prepared a number of business valuations engagements for major clients in various industries (Full market analysis report, financial modeling and report writing):  Valuation of real estate company in Qatar;  Valuation of a leading cement production factory in Qatar; and  Valuation of a leading newspaper in Qatar. 2. Prepared a number of feasibility studies engagements for major clients in various industries (Full market analysis report, financial modeling and report writing):  Financial feasibility study for establishing a 5-star resort hotel in the Pearl Development Qatar; and  Financial feasibility study for establishing a water park in Qatar; 3. Assisted in performing due diligence for a meat and livestock company under a pre-merger study. 4. Prepared a prospectus in English and Arabic for a leading holding company in order to be listed on Qatar Exchange. 5. Assisted in preparing tender submitted to a leading oil & gas company in Qatar. 6. Negotiated and structured financial details. 7. Translated financial statements and documents received from the clients. 8. Prepared control files for every engagement assigned to as per the global quality and risk management standards of E&Y. Ernst & Young, Lebanon May - July 2008 Internship – Trainee Responsibilities & Duties:  Assisted in performing external audit for MEA (Middle East Airlines);  Conducted analytical tasks as directed; and  Liaised with clients. Nasser Bin Khaled &Sons Holding Qatar May - July 2007 Internship – trainee
